summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Harrison Street from Eastlake Avenue to alley West of Bellevue Avenue North in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalk under Ordinance No. 13156, creating Local Improvement District No. 1185 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
